vote.title: A resolution authorizing City staff to engage with the City-Business Climate Alliance, in accordance with the Mayor’s Letter of Intent dated June 30, 2020 and with the Dallas business community, to further the city’s Comprehensive Environmental & Climate Action Plan (CECAP) goals; to coordinate applicable initiatives necessary to implement the CBCA actions and goals consistent with the CECAP; and to provide regular reporting on CBCA activities supporting CECAP implementation back to the Environment and Sustainability City Council Committee - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: A resolution authorizing City staff to engage with the City-Business Climate Alliance, in accordance with the Mayor’s Letter of Intent dated June 30, 2020 and with the Dallas business community, to further the city’s Comprehensive Environmental & Climate Action Plan (CECAP) goals; to coordinate applicable initiatives necessary to implement the CBCA actions and goals consistent with the CECAP; and to provide regular reporting on CBCA activities supporting CECAP implementation back to the Environment and Sustainability City Council Committee - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
